title: Opinions and suggestions regarding malware sandboxes [closed]
content:
I'm relatively new in the field of automatic malware analysis and I'd like to ask about hands-on opinions about sandboxes in the following aspects:

Till now I've been able to check cuckoobox system and it looks quiet promissing. I'd be glad to heir someones opinion (from personal experience) about that product too.

Thanx in advance.

comments.text: Hi! Welcome to Reverse Engineering. Opinion based questions and product reviews are generally not constructive. If you have a specific problem that you faced, then you can ask for solutions and suggestions about that. Stack Exchange differs from forums specifically because the platform is suited to objective oriented Q&As. See tour and faq for more.
If you want to ask about the effectiveness of a specific software/tool/plugin for a specific task/area, then you are welcome to do so.
